entries.name: get_instance(server, *options)
entries.desc: Factory for servlet instances that will handle a request from server using options from the mount point.  By default a new servlet instance is created for every call.

entries.name: new(server, *options)
entries.desc: Initializes a new servlet for server using options which are stored as-is in +@options+.  +@logger+ is also provided.

entries.name: do_OPTIONS(req, res)
entries.desc: Returns the allowed HTTP request methods

entries.name: service(req, res)
entries.desc: Dispatches to a do_ method based on req if such a method is available.  (do_GET for a GET request).  Raises a MethodNotAllowed exception if the method is not implemented.
